You join two blocks of stone as though they had been cut and dragged that way from the mountain. With your help, the wall should have no gaps whatsoever.

Level: 6
Category: Creation
Time: 10 minutes
Duration: Instantaneous
Component Cost: 50 gp
Market Price: 360 gp
Key Skill: Arcana (no check)

Two nonliving objects join together permanently. The boundary between them becomes as smooth and unnoticeable as possibleâ€”for objects that could fit together naturally, such as two blocks of stone, two planks of wood, or two pieces of a weapon, the ritual makes them completely seamless.

Published in Dragon Magazine 366, page(s) 30.
